name: What's For Tea!?
description: Search by meal name to find ingredients, search by the available ingredients in your house to get recipe suggestions, and then add the resulting meals to a mealplan!

name: What's The Weather Like?
description: Application utilising AJAX API calls to provide the user with up to date weather information for any city they choose.

name: Password Generator
description: A JavaScript application that generates randomly generated passwords for the user based on their preferences.

name: JavaScript Quiz
description: A JavaScript quiz built in JavaScript, manipulates DOM to display questions, local storage to save scores, and tense gameplay with timer
